item.title: Viet Hoang joins the lab as a Bioinformatics Analyst!
item.description: Viet Hoang joins the lab as a Bioinformatics Analyst, welcome!

item.title: Yuan Chang joins the lab as a rotation student!

item.title: Christie Lau joins the lab as a rotation student!
item.description: Christie Lau from the Department of Medical Biophysics joins the lab.

item.title: Lab opening
item.description: The lab is opening in October! Join our team to help develop new methods and algorithms to help us understand treatment-resistance in cancer and create new computational tools to improve diagnosis and guide therapy. We are accepting applications for all levels, from graduate student to postdoctoral fellow, as well as software engineers and bioinformaticians.
